CustomField.description: The difference between the created date of the lead and when we first attempt to contact them.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( OW_time_of_first_contact_attempt__c ), NULL, OW_time_of_first_contact_attempt__c - CreatedDate )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If blank, a first call has not been attempted or was not recorded (e.g. before we tracked this metric). The value is expressed in days (e.g. 1.5 days mean 36 hours). There is no adjustment for business hours.
CustomField.label: Time to first contact attempt
